elements.brief: Constructs a dmIntersection::Frustum from a View*P...

elements.name: CreateFrustumFromMatrix

parameters.doc: The matrix. Usually a "ViewProj" matrix
parameters.name: m

parameters.doc: true if the normals should be normalized
parameters.name: normalize

elements.brief: Returns the closest distance between a plane and a...
elements.description: Returns the closest distance between a plane and a position
elements.name: DistanceToPlane

parameters.doc: plane equation
parameters.name: plane

parameters.doc: position
parameters.name: pos

returnvalues.doc: closest distance between plane and position
returnvalues.name: distance

members.doc: ] plane equations: // left, right, bottom, top, near, far
members.name: m_Planes

elements.brief: Plane struct (currently an alias for dmVMath::Vect...
elements.description: Plane struct (currently an alias for dmVMath::Vector4)
elements.name: Plane

elements.brief: Tests intersection between a frustum and an orient...
elements.description: Tests intersection between a frustum and an oriented bounding box (OBB)
elements.name: TestFrustumOBB

parameters.doc: the frustum
parameters.name: frustum

parameters.doc: The world transform of the OBB
parameters.name: world

parameters.doc: the minimum corner of the object. In local space.
parameters.name: aabb_min

parameters.doc: the maximum corner of the object. In local space.
parameters.name: aabb_max

parameters.doc: if true, the near+far planes of the frustum are ignored
parameters.name: skip_near_far

returnvalues.doc: Returns true if the objects intersect
returnvalues.name: intersects

elements.brief: Tests intersection between a frustum and a point

parameters.doc: the frustum
parameters.name: frustum

parameters.doc: the position
parameters.name: pos

parameters.doc: if true, the near+far planes of the frustum are ignored
parameters.name: skip_near_far

returnvalues.doc: Returns true if the objects intersect
returnvalues.name: intersects

elements.brief: Tests intersection between a frustum and a sphere

parameters.name: skip_near_far

returnvalues.doc: Returns true if the objects intersect
